target_markets.market_description: AI startup founders and entrepreneurs in San Francisco
pain_points: scaling from 0 to high revenue quickly

problems_validated.problem: Context switching and inefficient AI interaction requiring manual prompting
problems_validated.market_gap: Current solutions don't understand full context of user's work history and require manual input

products_tools.name: Cluey
products_tools.use_case: AI assistant that understands full computer context without manual prompting
products_tools.metrics: $0 to $5 million ARR in 3 months, 5 person team, $1M ARR per employee

products_tools.name: Easy Tools
products_tools.use_case: Software for creators to sell digital products

business_strategies.strategy: Rapid scaling with minimal team size
business_strategies.case_study: Cluey went from $0 to $5M ARR in 3 months with 5 people

business_strategies.implementation: Provide meals, laundry, and workspace so founders only focus on building
business_strategies.expected_results: Founders can stay in flow state for days at a time
business_strategies.case_study: HF0 (Archbishop's Mansion) providing full support services

problems_solutions.problem: AI tools require too much manual prompting and lack context
problems_solutions.solution: Build AI that monitors screen activity and understands full work history

startup_ideas.idea: Context-aware AI assistant that eliminates manual prompting
startup_ideas.target_market: Knowledge workers and professionals using AI tools
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Inefficient AI interaction requiring constant manual input
startup_ideas.validation: Cluey achieving $5M ARR validates market demand

growth_tactics.tactic: Creating viral content and videos to build awareness
growth_tactics.results_expected: Millions of views and community building

steps: Host in public space like Dolores Park
growth_tactics.results_expected: Packed meetup with talented people attending

steps: AI analyzes current screen and historical context
AI provides relevant assistance without prompting
ai_workflows.use_case: Eliminating manual AI prompting by understanding full work context

metrics_kpis.tracking_method: Total ARR divided by number of employees
metrics_kpis.optimization_tip: Keep team lean while scaling revenue

trends_signals.trend: AI Gold Rush in San Francisco
trends_signals.opportunity: Massive opportunity for AI startups with renewed optimism in SF
Building AI tools that understand full user context rather than requiring manual input

trends_signals.trend: Founder house/accelerator models providing full life support
trends_signals.opportunity: Creating environments where founders can focus 100% on building

actionable_quotes.quote: In a world where GPT6 is out like nobody's going to be on chatgpt.com. Everybody will be on Cluey.
actionable_quotes.context: Discussing the future of AI interaction and context-aware tools
actionable_quotes.actionability: Build AI tools that eliminate the need for manual prompting by understanding context

actionable_quotes.quote: People can be in flow for not just like minutes at a time or hours at a time, but like days at a time.
actionable_quotes.context: Describing the HF0 founder house environment
actionable_quotes.actionability: Create environments that eliminate distractions to enable deep focus

actionable_quotes.quote: Right now is the time to harness the availability of AI to take your ideas into reality.
actionable_quotes.context: HF0 resident discussing current AI opportunity
actionable_quotes.actionability: Act now to leverage AI tools for rapid idea execution
